divs: sighting detailsmy son and i were walking back home and and when we got around the corner of the house in which we left he said mommy what is that up there. i turned to look and i could not move. it was in the shape of a triangle and it had bright white lights and then slowly one by one they went off. my son and i just stood there and then we ran off to get our friend but when we got back it was over. all i can honestly say is it gave me the chills all over and the goosebumps. thant very rarely happens to me. probably about a month ago my negihbor and i saw an object that had orange-white lights and again we were in shock. both times were around the same time whcih was about 10pm\ they sky were i saw it was a grey color and then the sky went back to normal later on. look this is as accurate as i can remeber and again i must stress it made me feel very unease. i tried to stay outside but the bugs were bad and i must admit it freaked me out.i told my son it was fireworks and they were the quiet ones. i am sorry i dont have any photos or proof but i know what i saw and that is why i wrote this.
Summary: it was triangle shape with atleast 5 lights on each side lights were white and went off one by one slowly
